language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: kalovakalova - from the word for fire which is "kalova(qalova)". It does not strictly describe red but a color spectrum of fire from red to orange(excluding yellow).
Red, applied to feathers, cloth etc. imported to the islands,also to the scarlet berries or peas used in their ornaments (Crk)
Means 'red' as well as 'well cooked' or 'mûr' as a fruit
